revised_title: The Direct Measurement of the Amplitude of the Minimum Audible Impulsive Sound
tldr: The author conducted experiments to directly measure the amplitude of the minimum audible impulsive sound without extrapolation. They found that the minimum audible amplitude for a sensitive ear is 0.7 / qa, which refers to a telephone of usual construction with a diaphragm fundamental of about 580. This research helps improve our understanding of sound measurement and audibility.
